name: Avoid SQL using GROUP BY (PeopleSoft)
description: This rule searches for all GROUP BY inside PeopleSoft SQL Definitions
output:
This report lists all PeopleSoft SQL Definitions using a GROUP BY clause. It provides the following information:
- PeopleSoft SQL Definitions full name.
rationale: Using complex queries in Artifacts can cause performance problems. Queries using the GROUP BY clause are considered complex and inefficient.
remediation: Review the design of the query to avoid if possible GROUP BY clause.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
